Anvils and Lightbulbs On the Road with PaaS

This is a presentation, augmented with demo

LIGHTBULB

PaaS: for devs convergence of decades of software engineering best practices wave why

Until now, software tools were divided amongst languages, services, and frameworks

PaaS unifies application development, and the realm of software engineering, like nothing before. This was inevitable, but the pieces weren’t in place until recently, with the advent of VMs, …

multiple projects by providing a foundation for all developers.

example list of languages / frameworks

Every software team has some end goal in sight:

New project initiated. Plan, hire, research, design, install/configure,

Heroku: ruby python java scale clojure, node, logo (but not apex) uses git to push: git push heroku master (equiv to stackato push) this git integration gives: instant rollback (heroku rollback) can got back to any version or release

Note: everything that heroku talks about applies to stackato, but not private
